sections.purpose: To clean and dry glassware contaminated with plant extracts and solvents.
sections.scope: Applicable to routine glassware cleaning in Pharmacognosy.
procedure: Load glassware securely in racks designed for the washer.
Add appropriate detergent for pharmaceutical glassware.
Select cycle (pre-wash, wash, rinse, dry) and start.
Remove and inspect glassware after cycle.
precautions: Inspect for breakage after each cycle.
